fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chest pain on exertion, shortness of breath.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of smoking, hypertension, diabetes, hyperlipidemia.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May have normal examination; signs of heart failure might be present in advanced cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of blood pressure and cholesterol, stress test as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Educate on symptom management and when to seek emergency care
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Shortness of breath, fatigue, swollen legs.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Previous heart attack, hypertension, valvular heart disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Affects cardiovascular, respiratory, and renal systems.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Crackles in lungs, pitting oedema in legs, jugular venous distension.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, renal failure
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Diuretics, ACE inhibitors, beta-blockers, aldosterone antagonists
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor fluid status, manage comorbid disease, patient education on diet and activity
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular echocardiograms to assess heart function, adjust medications as needed
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Palpitations, feeling faint, shortness of breath.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Alcohol use, heart disease, hypertension, thyroid disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Irregular pulse, may be rapid; otherwise, physical exam often normal.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Heart palpitations from other causes, anxiety
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Rate control, rhythm control, anticoagulation to prevent stroke
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Education on stroke risk, regular monitoring with EKGs, manage underlying disease
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Assess for bleeding risk with anticoagulants, lifestyle modifications
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Often asymptomatic, detected on routine examination.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Family history of hypertension, obesity, lack of physical activity.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Physical exam generally normal; may find retinopathy in severe cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Secondary causes of hypertension, such as renal artery stenosis
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular blood pressure monitoring, adjust treatment based on targets
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Educate on lifestyle interventions, importance of adherence to medication
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Leg pain when walking, cold feet, leg numbness or weakness.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Affects cardiovascular and peripheral vascular systems.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Decreased pulses in feet, may have bruits over arteries.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Walking program, smoking cessation, manage cardiovascular risk factors
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Follow-up for symptom progression, consider revascularization if symptoms worsen
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Shortness of breath, fatigue, irregular heartbeat.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of rheumatic fever, congenital valve defects, age-related changes.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Affects cardiovascular system; may lead to heart failure.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Heart murmur, possible signs of heart failure.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Heart failure, myocardial infarction, hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Medications to manage symptoms, surgical repair or replacement of the valve
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular echocardiograms, manage risk factors for coronary artery disease
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Assess for progression of disease, consider intervention if symptoms worsen
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chest pain, shortness of breath, fatigue.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Viral infections, autoimmune disease, exposure to toxins.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the heart muscle, affecting the hearts electrical system and pumping function.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible fever, heart sounds may include murmurs or rubs.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Supportive care, treat underlying cause, possible use of anti-inflammatory medications
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor cardiac function, avoid strenuous activity until resolved
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up, consider cardiac MRI for evaluation of recovery
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain and swelling in one leg, warmth over the affected area.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Prolonged sitting or immobility, recent surgery, history of clotting disorders.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A clot in a deep vein, usually in the legs, which can lead to pulmonary embolism.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swelling, redness, warmth in the affected leg.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Wearing compression stockings, regular follow-up for anticoagulation therapy
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Evaluate for post-thrombotic syndrome, adjust anticoagulant as needed
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Electrolyte imbalances, heart disease, medication side effects.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Irregular heartbeats that can be too fast, too slow, or erratic.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Medication to control heart rate or rhythm, possible ablation or pacemaker
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring with ECG, lifestyle modifications
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Adjust treatment based on symptoms and ECG findings, educate on symptom management
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Often asymptomatic, may be detected during imaging for another reason.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A bulge in the aorta that can rupture, leading to life-threatening bleeding.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pulsatile abdominal mass, bruit over the aneurysm.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Monitoring of aneurysm size, blood pressure control, surgery for large or symptomatic aneurysms
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular ultrasound or CT scans to monitor size, manage risk factors for atherosclerosis
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Surgical consultation for aneurysms approaching surgical threshold
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chest pain, shortness of breath, similar to heart attack symptoms.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Often triggered by severe stress or emotional loss.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Temporary weakening of the hearts left ventricle.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May have a normal exam or signs mimicking a heart attack.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Supportive care, heart failure medications temporarily
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoidance of stressors, regular follow-up, echocardiography to monitor recovery
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Educate on the temporary nature of the disease, potential for full recovery
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Heart murmur, shortness of breath, chest pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Damage to heart valves as a result of rheumatic fever.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Signs of valve stenosis or regurgitation on auscultation.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Penicillin prophylaxis to prevent recurrence, valve repair or replacement as needed
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular dental care to prevent infective endocarditis, echocardiograms to monitor valve function
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for heart failure symptoms, manage anticoagulation if atrial fibrillation occurs
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fainting, seizures, sudden cardiac death in severe cases.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be congenital or acquired, often due to genetic mutations or medications.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Abnormality in the hearts electrical recharging system.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal physical exam; diagnosis primarily by ECG.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Beta-blockers, avoidance of QT-prolonging drugs, possible implantable defibrillator
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular ECG monitoring, genetic testing for family members
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Educate on avoiding medications that prolong the QT interval, recognise symptoms of arrhythmias
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe hypotension, weak pulse, rapid breathing, cold and clammy skin.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Most commonly caused by a severe heart attack.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disease where the heart suddenly cant pump enough blood to meet the bodys needs.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Rapid heart rate, low blood pressure, signs of poor perfusion.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Inotropic support, mechanical circulatory support, treat underlying cause
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Intensive care monitoring, follow-up for heart function assessment
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Assess for recovery and rehabilitation potential, consider long-term support if needed
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Shortness of breath, fatigue, chest pain, oedema.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be idiopathic, hereditary, or associated with other disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: High blood pressure in the arteries to the lungs, leading to right heart failure.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Elevated jugular venous pressure, peripheral oedema, ascites in advanced cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), left heart disease
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Vasodilators, endothelin receptor antagonists, oxygen therapy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular echocardiograms, right heart catheterisation as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for progression, manage complications such as right heart failure
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Heart murmur, shortness of breath, especially during feeding in infants.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Congenital heart defect present at birth.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A hole in the hearts septum separating the two ventricles.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Loud heart murmur best heard at the left lower sternal border.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Patent ductus arteriosus, atrial septal defect
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Observation for small defects, surgical repair for larger defects or those causing symptoms
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up with paediatric cardiologist, monitoring growth and development
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Assess for signs of heart failure or pulmonary hypertension, educate parents on signs to watch for
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Often asymptomatic, possible exercise intolerance, palpitations.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A hole in the hearts septum separating the two atria.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Soft systolic murmur, fixed split second heart sound.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Ventricular septal defect, patent foramen ovale
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Closure during cardiac catheterisation or surgery for larger defects
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular cardiac evaluations, monitoring for arrhythmias
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Evaluate need for closure based on size and symptoms, monitor for pulmonary hypertension
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: May result from congenital disease, heart attack, or degeneration of electrical conduction system.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Impaired electrical conduction in the heart, leading to slow or blocked heart beats.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Sinus node dysfunction, atrial fibrillation with slow ventricular response
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of pacemaker function, avoid medications that may worsen bradycardia
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Educate on symptoms of pacemaker malfunction, regular follow-up appointments
fields.label: Accurex Message
